question: Magnitude of flux in an energy meter varies __________

answers.a: due to abnormal currents and voltages
answers.b: due to high resistance and inductance values
answers.c: due to changes in the transformer turns
answers.d: due to the induced e.m.f in the windings

question: How can temperature effect be compensated in an energy meter?

answers.b: due to reversal in polarity of voltage
answers.c: due to asymmetry in magnetic circuit
answers.d: due to asymmetry in electric circuit

question: Supply voltage in an energy meter is __________
How is the flux of shunt coil related to voltage?

answers.a: flux is proportional to square of voltage
